headlines: Disney+ and Hulu bundle drops to $5 per month for one year for Black Friday
Stream Disney+ and Hulu for a discounted price this holiday season
Take advantage of the limited-time offer on the Disney+ and Hulu bundle
tts_script: This Black Friday, stream Disney+ and Hulu for just $5 per month for one year. Don't miss out on this limited-time offer.

original_raw_news.original_title: The Disney+ Hulu bundle drops to $5 per month for one year for Black Friday
